Package it.unimol.monopoly.app

package it.unimol.monopoly.app
  • Related Packages

    Description
    it.unimol.monopoly

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Box
    Class that logically represents a box.
    Contract
    Class that defines the Contract object, with all the logical methods for purchasing a contract, paying rent and checking if multiple contracts are equal.
    ContractManager
    Class whose aim is to manage contracts.
    Fee
    Simple class that defines the Fee object.
    Game
    Initialization class of the game of Monopoly.
    Pawn
    Class that defines the Pawn object, chosen by each player before the start of the match.
    PawnManager
    Singleton that manages all the different pawns.
    Player
    Class that defines the Player object, one of the most important ones, because it allows the execution of all those methods which require the need of a player.
    PlayerManager
    Class made to manage players.
    PositionManager
    Singleton that manages player positions, which works together with the Box class.
    Prison
    Singleton that defines the Prison object.
    Rent
    A short class that handles the logic of rent payments.
    Turn
    Singleton that defines the Turn object.
